snippet: Anita Dunn, a former communications director for President Obama, was paid about $34,200 by the Campaign for One New York, a nonprofit with close ties to Mayor Bill de Blasio.
abstract: Records indicate Anita Dunn, former communications director for Pres Obama, was paid about $34,200 by Campaign for One New York, political group paying for New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio's bid to move Democratic Party to left.
lead_paragraph: Anita Dunn, a former communications director for President Obama, was paid about $34,200 by the Campaign for One New York, a nonprofit with close ties to Mayor Bill de Blasio.

headline.main: Records for Group Backing Mayor Show Payment to an Ex-Obama Strategist
headline.print_headline: Records for Group Backing Mayor Show Payment to an Ex-Obama Strategist
